message: Let's start with a fair split. I'll give you $40, and I'll take $60. No negotiations, just a fair deal.
I'll take the majority, you get a small share. Don't expect more.
We're not that far apart. I'll meet you in the middle. 50-50 split. Let's end this.
You're not willing to give me the majority, so I'll take it all. But I'll be generous and give you a small token.
I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I'm not going to give in to your demands. 55-45 split. That's as close as I'll go.
You're still not giving me enough. I'll take almost all of it, and leave you with just a few scraps.
I'm not going to give in completely. I'll give you a slightly larger share, but I'm not going to let you take it all. 60-40 split. That's my final offer.
